author: Will Jones
description:
Keir Starmer is pushing for everyone in Britain to be forced to sign up for a digital ID card after Emmanuel Macron demanded action to tackle the scourge of illegal working in Britain.

The post Starmer Pushes Digital ID Cards for All After Macron Demands Action to Tackle Scourge of Illegal Working in Britain appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Starmer Pushes Digital ID Cards for All After Macron Demands Action to Tackle Scourge of Illegal Working in Britain

author: Will Jones
description:
London Mayor Sadiq Khan today demanded the axing of Britain's biggest arms fair because it offends asylum seekers and is "inappropriate" during Israel's Gaza campaign.

The post Sadiq Khan Demands Axing of London Arms Fair Saying it Offends Asylum Seekers and is “Inappropriate” During Israel’s Gaza Campaign appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Sadiq Khan Demands Axing of London Arms Fair Saying it Offends Asylum Seekers and is “Inappropriate” During Israel’s Gaza Campaign

author: Dr Clare Craig
description:
There was a "generational slaughter" in care homes during Covid. But it wasn't mainly caused by a virus, says diagnostic pathologist Dr Clare Craig. Now the Covid Inquiry has heard the harrowing evidence of mistreatment.

The post There Was a “Generational Slaughter” in Care Homes During Covid. But it Wasn’t Caused by a Virus appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: There Was a “Generational Slaughter” in Care Homes During Covid. But it Wasn’t Caused by a Virus

author: Will Jones
description:
A hard Left former hypnotherapist who claimed that women could increase their breast size with their mind has been elected as the new leader of the Green Party.

The post New Green Party Leader is Former Hypnotherapist who Claimed Women Could Increase Breast Size with Mind appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: New Green Party Leader is Former Hypnotherapist who Claimed Women Could Increase Breast Size with Mind

author: Will Jones
description:
Father Ted creator Graham Linehan has said he was arrested by five armed police officers at Heathrow Airport over a series of gender-critical tweets.

The post BREAKING: Father Ted Creator Graham Linehan “Arrested” at Heathrow for Trans Tweets appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: BREAKING: Father Ted Creator Graham Linehan “Arrested” at Heathrow for Trans Tweets

author: Guy de la Bédoyère
description:
Why does almost nothing get done properly in Britain? It's because they follow one simple law, says Guy de la Bédoyère: every organisation, committee and project will inevitably degenerate into a scene from Dad's Army.

The post Why Does Everything in Britain End Up Like An Episode Of Dad’s Army? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Does Everything in Britain End Up Like An Episode Of Dad’s Army?

author: Ben Pile
description:
It's great that Kemi Badenoch says the Tories will now drill in the North Sea. But can the party that brought us the fracking ban and windfall tax be trusted while its wet-green wing is still at large? asks Ben Pile.

The post Can the Tories’ Junking of Net Zero Be Trusted? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Can the Tories’ Junking of Net Zero Be Trusted?
